Metadata: Where in the world? (Exotic Aquatics on the Move flash cards)
see the accompanying lesson plan WASHU-E-01-001.

This set of 48 flashcards is designed to accompany the 'Where in the World?' section in 'Exotic Aquatics on the Move: Lesson Plans' (WASHU-​E-​01-​001), a collection of classroom and field activities. The flashcards present facts and color photos of 12 aquatic species that have invaded different parts of the world.
